com.linkedin.cubert.io.text

Class PigTextOutputFormatWrapper<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<K,V>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.FileOutputFormat<K,V>
        • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.TextOutputFormat<WritableComparable,org.apache.pig.data.Tuple>
          • org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.mapReduceLayer.PigTextOutputFormat
            • com.linkedin.cubert.io.text.PigTextOutputFormatWrapper<K,V>

  • public class PigTextOutputFormatWrapper<K,V>
extends org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.mapReduceLayer.PigTextOutputFormat
    The wrapper around pig text output format. Provides the ability to set the appropriate field separator while writing the text file. We need this wrapper because PigTextOutputFormat doesn't provide empty constructor, which means it's objects cannot be created via reflection. This wrapper solves both problems.
